Constructor Detail

CachedTileBackground

public CachedTileBackground(BaseGraphics bsGraphics,
                            java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] images,
                            int[][] tiles)
Create a regular TileBackground using the bsGraphics to generate a big managed image to cache the rending.

Method Detail

checkMutations

protected void checkMutations()
Check the background to see if it must be fully rendered. (to see if the cache must be invalidate) The cache is valid if : 1) It was already valid and 2) The background did not move.

update

public void update(long elapsedTime)
Description copied from class: Background
Updates this background, this method is usually used to create background animation or other special effect on the background.

The implementation of this method provided by the Background class does nothing.

Overrides:
update in class Background

render

public void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
Render the background using the cache. If the cache is not valid, render the background to it to make it valid again. The draw the cache to the screen.

Overrides:
render in class Background
Parameters:
g -
